channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: It’s getting harder to find a job — and AI tools aren’t making it any easier
item.description: Companies are increasingly leaning on AI tools in hiring. Candidates are using the same technology to beat the algorithm and get eyes on their résumé....

item.title: Treasury yields inch higher ahead of pivotal jobs data
item.description: Bond yields inched higher Friday ahead of pivotal jobs data that could shape expectations for the next Federal Reserve interest-rate decision.

item.title: Robotaxis Can't Be a Solo Act
item.description: Networks of expensive, self-driving cars need a wide base of paying riders, which could make Uber essential to Tesla’s success.

item.title: Gold Futures Rise Slightly Ahead of U.S. Economic Data
item.description: Gold futures nudged higher, close to all-time highs ahead of key U.S. economic data.

item.title: Eurozone, U.K. Government Bond Yields Rise Ahead of U.S. Jobs Data
item.description: Yields on eurozone and U.K. government bonds rose ahead of key U.S. jobs data at 1230 GMT as investors seek clues on whether the Federal Reserve will ...

item.title: You make saving and spending goals but keep missing them. Don’t regret — reset.
item.description: Figure out what obstacles came up to derail the process. Then move forward.

item.title: ‘I don’t want to spend my remaining days living hand to mouth’: I divorced my husband and remarried. Can I claim his Social Security?
item.description: “I hope that it doesn’t trigger my ex-husband. He has a short fuse.”

item.title: Sterling, Gilt Yields Rise After BOE's Pill Signals Gradual Rate Cuts
item.description: Sterling extended its rise slightly after the BOE’s chief economist signalled gradual interest-rate cuts, comments which come after the pound was hit ...

item.title: ‘Their house was purchased with my family money’: My late father left a life estate to his second wife. She’s only 10 years older than me. How can I undo this?
item.description: “Apparently the probate laws in Florida are different, perhaps superseding the will.”

item.title: Oil Little Changed After Jumping 5% on Middle East Fears
item.description: Oil prices were broadly stable in early European trading after rising 5% on growing fears that Israel would retaliate against Iran by targeting its oi...
